fact.description: Today's referee, Benjamin Williams, has blown to start the match.
Free kick Ecuador.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ecuador in their own half.
Throw-in for Honduras at Arena da Baixada.
Honduras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Honduras drive forward and Boniek Garcia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick in a good position for Ecuador!
Victor Bernardez (Honduras) has received a first yellow card.
In Curitiba, Christian Noboa of Ecuador is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Walter Ayovi for Ecuador gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Benjamin Williams awards Honduras a goal kick.
Throw-in Ecuador.
Ecuador to take a throw-in in Honduras territory.
Benjamin Williams signals a Ecuador throw-in in Honduras's half.
Can Ecuador get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Throw-in Honduras.
Can Honduras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ecuador's half?
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras.
Ball safe as Ecuador is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ecuador at Arena da Baixada.
Benjamin Williams signals a Honduras throw-in in Ecuador's half.
Throw-in for Ecuador in their own half.
Carlos Costly of Honduras gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Ecuador at Arena da Baixada.
Ecuador awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ecuador goal kick.
Throw-in for Ecuador close to the penalty box.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Ecuador's Enner Valencia breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Honduras have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Ecuador.
Ecuador have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Corner awarded to Ecuador.
Throw-in for Ecuador at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in Honduras.
Ecuador to take a throw-in in Honduras territory.
Honduras to take a throw-in in Ecuador territory.
Benjamin Williams signals a Ecuador throw-in in Honduras's half.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Honduras push forward at Arena da Baixada and Roger Espinoza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ecuador defence.
Honduras have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Honduras surge into the attack at Arena da Baixada but Victor Bernardez’s header is off-target.
Benjamin Williams awards Ecuador a goal kick.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Ecuador get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Honduras to take a throw-in in Ecuador territory.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Ecuador in their own half.
Victor Bernardez with an assist there.
That's a fine assist from Juan Carlos Paredes.
Can Honduras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ecuador's half?
Ecuador have a goal kick.
Benjamin Williams signals a Ecuador throw-in in Honduras's half.
Throw-in for Honduras in their own half.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Ecuador.
Goal kick for Honduras at Arena da Baixada.
Honduras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ecuador awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been resumed at Arena da Baixada.
Juan Carlos Paredes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ecuador’s Juan Carlos Paredes is on his feet again at Arena da Baixada.
Ecuador awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ecuador.
Honduras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ecuador.
Ball goes out of play for a Honduras goal kick.
Walter Ayovi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ecuador.
Ecuador have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Carlos Costly.
The match in Curitiba is underway once more.
Carlos Costly is back on his feet again.
Free kick Honduras.
Honduras's Victor Bernardez gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Honduras have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Goal kick for Ecuador at Arena da Baixada.
2 minutes will be added to the first half.
The first-half is over.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Ecuador in their own half.
Jerry Bengtson for Honduras has been booked by Benjamin Williams and receives a first yellow card.
Brayan Beckeles of Honduras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Juan Carlos Garcia is on a sub for Emilio Izaguirre for Honduras.
Ecuador's Jefferson Montero is whistled for offside at Arena da Baixada.
Ecuador are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ecuador awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Honduras.
In Curitiba Ecuador attack through Christian Noboa. The finish is off target, however.
Benjamin Williams awards Honduras a goal kick.
Can Honduras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ecuador's half?
Ecuador awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ecuador.
Ecuador have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Ecuador to take a throw-in in Honduras territory.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Ecuador awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Ecuador's Antonio Valencia has been booked in Curitiba.
Corner awarded to Ecuador.
Throw-in for Honduras in their own half.
Ecuador have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Honduras's Jerry Bengtson is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Honduras.
Honduras are pushing forward but Jorge Claros's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ecuador goal kick.
Ecuador have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Ecuador attack but Frickson Erazo's header doesn't find the target.
Honduras have a goal kick.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras.
Honduras drive forward but Carlos Costly is judged offside.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Ecuador just outside Honduras's area.
Corner awarded to Ecuador.
Great play from Walter Ayovi to set up the goal.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Honduras at Arena da Baixada.
Ecuador needs to be cautious. Honduras have an attacking throw-in.
Benjamin Williams signals a throw-in for Honduras, close to Ecuador's area.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Ecuador in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Alexander Dominguez for Ecuador who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Play has been resumed.
Alexander Dominguez for Ecuador is back on the field again.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Fernando Suarez Guzman is making the team's second substitution at Arena da Baixada with Mario Martinez replacing Luis Garrido.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Free kick Honduras.
Enner Valencia (Ecuador) gets a yellow card.
Honduras's Maynor Figueroa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ecuador have a goal kick.
Free kick Honduras.
Mario Martinez (Honduras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Honduras.
Benjamin Williams signals a Honduras throw-in in Ecuador's half.
Can Honduras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ecuador's half?
Honduras are coming forward and Roger Espinoza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Ecuador goal kick.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras.
Throw-in Ecuador.
Jefferson Montero (Ecuador) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Important block from the Ecuador defence as Roger Espinoza fires in a strike for Honduras.
Ecuador make their first substitution with Edison Mendez replacing Felipe Caicedo.
Carlos Gruezo is replacing Oswaldo Minda for Ecuador at Arena da Baixada.
Honduras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Ecuador.
Benjamin Williams signals a Ecuador throw-in in Honduras's half.
In Curitiba Ecuador drive forward through Enner Valencia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Honduras's Maynor Figueroa misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Ecuador at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Honduras at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Ecuador in their own half.
Can Ecuador capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The second half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Gabriel Achilier is on a sub for Jefferson Montero for Ecuador.
Ecuador have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Ecuador have a dangerous throw-in.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Ecuador get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Benjamin Williams awards Ecuador a goal kick.
Ball safe as Ecuador is awarded a throw-in in their half.
That's full-time at Arena da Baixada. The final score is 1-2.
